updates.title: OpenAI reveals $20B ARR milestone and announces $1.4 trillion in data center commitments as Sora mobile app sees explosive growth with nearly 500K Android installs on launch day
Perplexity signs major $400M deal with Snap to power AI search in Snapchat, marking significant expansion of AI-powered search beyond traditional platforms
Apple reportedly nearing $1B annual deal with Google to integrate Gemini AI into Siri, signaling major shift in voice assistant strategy and AI partnerships
Amazon launches AI-powered Kindle Translate service for e-book authors while Google Maps integrates Gemini navigation features in India, expanding AI into content creation and location services
Meta expands AI-generated short-form video feed 'Vibes' to Europe, reporting 10x increase in media generation within Meta AI app since launch
